## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                  | Type                        | Default      |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------- | ------------ |
| `mode`   | `mode`    | Define the color of the logo. `standard`: Default. show a light green / dark green conventional SE logo. `inherited`: `take the color from it's parent.    * | `"inherited" \| "standard"` | `"standard"` |
